'''''Questioning the Heart of Flames''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the following sub-quests in the {{Quest|In Search of a Hidden Heart}}:
* [[Where Once There Was a Calculation Array]]
* [[Where Once Force Was Reversed]]
* [[Where Once There Were Arms Aplenty]]

==Gameplay Notes==
* If a player was affected by the bug where this achievement could not be completed at the beginning of [[Version 5.5]], they can trigger the achievement by teleporting to the Teleport Waypoint near the [[Ruined Armament Workshop]] of the [[Ancient Sacred Mountain]].
